summary: An Ordinance providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the laying off, extending and establishing of Thirty-fourth Avenue West, from West Barrett Street to West McGraw Street; West McGraw Street, from Thirty-fourth Avenue West as extended herein to Thirty-second Avenue West as extended herein; and of Thirty-second Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to Logan Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, as public streets and highways, as provided for and specified in Ordinance No. 32897 of said city, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
